body_html:
@zakizhou thank you for the code lines. This is indeed a workaround, but the issue is that either you shouldn't need to do that (IMO the conversion could be automatic), or, if you do need, this should be stated in the Keras guide (preferably with some explanation...).

Exactly the same issue has been closed as solved once (#20827), so I suppose this has been fixed somehow at that time.

body:
@zakizhou thank you for the code lines. This is indeed a workaround, but the issue is that either you shouldn't need to do that (IMO the conversion could be automatic), or, if you do need, this should be stated in the Keras guide (preferably with some explanation...).

Exactly the same issue has been closed as solved once (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/20827), so I suppose this has been fixed somehow at that time.
